title: security alert?????

replies.body: I've escalated the issue to Riot. Thanks for your report!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=BR7iQkeE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-01T11:22:18.500+0000)
>
> I've escalated the issue to Riot. Thanks for your report!

Hey mate so it seemed to have stopped popping up for me. I think it may have had something to so with us in OZ being in 2016 and the US being in 2015. I dunno but I havent seen the message today.
Yup, Riot was quick to resolve this issue a few hours after the New Year Pacific Standard Time. If you have any further issues, feel free to report them here.
I submitted a ticket so hopefully will have an answer soonish
once you get a reply back  can you message me on what we should do

I'm getting the exact same message. I have no idea what it means and after Googling it I came up with no answer. I thought my PC had a virus or something. I'm repairing my client as we speak but this is really weird.
hmm how do i repair my client ?

> [{quoted}](name=LlamaIover,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=BR7iQkeE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-01T01:55:40.314+0000)
>
> hmm how do i repair my client ?

It's not your client, it's Riot's SSL certificate falling out of date. Just say yes and ignore it, it shouldn't pop up afterwords anyways.
It didn't work. I'm still getting the pop up when after I log in. This is really weird.
Before you click launch click on the '?' top right then click repair. I'm not sure if it will fix it though. Mine is still repairing.
